user_stories.action: create a new export shipment filing, inputting all required header and commodity data
user_stories.benefit: I can accurately prepare the Electronic Export Information (EEI) needed for my shipment.
related_functionality: Create new export shipment filings with header and commodity data.
Input and manage required data elements for shipments (parties, transport details, commodity info).

user_stories.action: transmit the completed EEI filing to AES
user_stories.benefit: I can obtain the Internal Transaction Number (ITN) required for export clearance and comply with regulations.
related_functionality: Transmit initial EEI filings to AES.

user_stories.action: revise a previously accepted filing using a 'Replace' or 'Change' action to update details like the port of export or commodity information
user_stories.benefit: I can ensure the submitted EEI remains accurate and compliant even if shipment details change after initial filing.
related_functionality: Revise previously accepted filings using Replace/Change actions (e.g., change port, add/delete/modify commodity lines).

user_stories.benefit: I can withdraw an EEI submission for a shipment that is no longer exporting, maintaining compliance.

user_stories.action: review and manage the required data elements (parties, transport, commodities) within a filing before transmission
user_stories.benefit: I can verify the accuracy and completeness of the EEI data to minimize errors and ensure compliance.
related_functionality: Input and manage required data elements for shipments (parties, transport details, commodity info).

user_stories.action: correct data elements like quantity or value based on fatal error responses received from AES
user_stories.benefit: I can quickly resolve issues identified by CBP and successfully resubmit the filing to achieve acceptance.
related_functionality: Handle basic error correction based on AES responses (e.g., correcting quantity after fatal error).

user_stories.action: input and manage transportation details within the EEI filing when responsible for providing this data
user_stories.benefit: I can ensure the mode of transport, carrier SCAC, and vessel information are correctly reported as required.
related_functionality: Input and manage required data elements for shipments (parties, transport details, commodity info).

user_stories.action: add or delete commodity lines on a previously accepted filing via a revision
user_stories.benefit: I can accurately reflect changes to the goods being shipped after the initial submission.
related_functionality: Revise previously accepted filings using Replace/Change actions (e.g., change port, add/delete/modify commodity lines).
